Title:

Codes.CodeFormat: Refactor direction.
Add rotation formula to direction (translate axis to (0,0) than to (x,y)).
Add Entity - base class to Player and Ball.
Add Ball instead of player to direction proto.

Add ball render to direction.
Added EntityV2 with multiple renders (using inheritance).
Added BallV2.
EntityV3, BallV3 with renderers composition instead of inheritance. (Separete renders for graphics and text)
Fix renders in direction proto. Fix ballV3 bug.
Experiment with direction. ToDo: Create direction class, separete from Ball. To observe ball trajectory compared with it, also to be independant drom ball.
Added Bearing class. Ball speed directed in direction of bearing vector. Ball has proper start in direction prototype. It starts toward left or right player, in such a direction as to score point.
Ball direction is developed in direction prototype. Move it to the Game.
Fix 0 angle case by makeing angle a litle bigger than 0. Add ball reset. Add reset to Direction, after Start click, reset when ball is off screen.
New gui for laptop version.
Improve gui/text. Added overlay to read mouse coordinates. Improved points look.

Improve text. Refactored text drawing in pong only, broken everywhere else.
Add points canvas. Add class to handle canvases easier.
